title: Beyond the notified zone of 100 m
clause_text: Beyond the notified zone of 100 m., no restriction is required to be imposed as per the Works of Defence Act 1903 and no N.O.C. from Air Force Station, Thane is necessary.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Beyond the notified zone of 100 m., no restriction is required to be imposed as per the Works of Defence Act 1903 and no N.O.C. from Air Force Station, Thane is necessary.
